title: Do Re Miiiiii
story: The records of the Elf Choir have been scratched! All the recordings of the hit album 'Elf on itself' are ruined and nobody knows which song is which anymore! Help the elves to remember.
shortstory: The Elf Choir has forgotten the titles of its Christmas carols.
content: Listen to the station coordinator! You will receive tips on the song.
points: You will receive 10 points per 🔗#song. Each tip is worth -2 points.
